short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a link in twitter to the XRPTipBot statistics page of the user who has tweeted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Extension adds a link in twitter to the XRPTipBot statistics page of the user who has tweeted.

An example link would look like this:

https://xrptipbot-stats.com/userstatistics?user=nixerFFM&network=twitter
